segments.text: what ? How could you forget to reserve the concert tickets ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry . I forget all about it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How could you ? I reminded you just this morning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's leap my mind . I really feel terrible about it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have been looking forward to this performance all month .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm really sorry I let you down . I'll make it up to you somehow .
segments.speaker: S2
